department: Departement of Public Work and Government Services (PSPC)
description: CSE recruitment marketing activities aim to increase awareness of CSE, increase applications to CSE job opportunities, position CSE as an employer of choice, and position CSE as an organization that deliberately supports equity, diversity, and inclusion. The proposed contract period is from contract award to 1 year after contract award.
